description:
This video was recorded at Zendcon 2015 (http://zendcon.com) in the Green Room of The Joint (http://hardrockhotel.com/las-vegas-concerts/the-joint) at the Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas.

In this interview with Drupal Core contributor Larry Garfield (https://twitter.com/crell) we hear about the origin story of Drupal 8.

Larry addresses the key objectives of Drupal 8 and the technical challenges that lead to the adoption of technology from the broader PHP community such as Composer, Twig and a set of Symfony Components.

Larry works at Palantir (https://www.palantir.net) and he blogs at http://www.garfieldtech.com

title: The Drupal 8 origin story with Larry Garfield
